snippet.title: Light Fantastic: 8 Ways to Get a Twinkle On
snippet.description: Add some twinkle to your holiday celebrations with these 8 ideas for Christmas lights. From the family dog to the fireplace, you're sure to find a sparkling way to light up your festivities.

snippet.title: Tron Light Disc Toss
snippet.description: Inspired by the futuristic world of Disney's Tron, this craft lets kids create their own Light Discs and then test their tossing skills in a spin on the classic ring toss party game.

snippet.title: Special Complementary Therapies for Chronic Pain
snippet.description: Special Complementary Therapies To Help Your Child With Chronic Pain

snippet.title: The Power of Touch Through Massage
snippet.description: How Massage Therapy Can Relieve Stress and Provide Peace

snippet.title: European Landscape Lights for Your Garden
snippet.description: European Landscape Lights Add a Quaint Touch to Any Yard

snippet.title: Kevin Flynn's Light Cycle
snippet.description: Build this 3D replica of Kevin Flynn's Light Cycle and take it for a spin on the grid!

snippet.title: Music Review: The Red Light District
snippet.description: Ludacris may be talented, but he isn't for kids.

snippet.title: Iridessa's Holiday Light Necklace
snippet.description: Leave it to a fairy who gives fireflies their glow and spreads light through rainbows to come up with a holiday idea that really shines -- like stringing miniature Christmas light ornaments into sparkly necklaces.

snippet.title: Clu's Light Cycle
snippet.description: Build this 3D replica of Clu's Light Cycle and you'll become the envy of all your closest programs faster than this bike can drive!

snippet.title: Corneal Refractive Therapy
